reg_info.act_under: Building Opportunities in the Skilled Trades Act, 2021

content.content: 1. For the purposes of the Act and the regulations, “journeyperson” means an individual who holds a certificate of qualification or an individual who practices as a journeyperson in a trade that is not prescribed as compulsory and who does not hold a certificate of qualification in that trade.
content.raw_html:
1. For the purposes of the Act and the regulations,

“journeyperson” means an individual who holds a certificate of qualification or an individual who practices as a journeyperson in a trade that is not prescribed as compulsory and who does not hold a certificate of qualification in that trade.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
